title: Monsters Rolodex
description: A react based web page will diplay monsters information in cards & search to filter monster based on names

title: Feedback UI React App
description: App built using React fundamentals like Components, JSX, Props, State, Handling events, Forms, List & Keys, Hooks

title: A2Z Dental Care
description: A dental clinic website developed & hosted on net. User can call, send whatsapp message & fill a form from website.

title: Music Player
description: Music player application that is developed using HTML, CSS & JS will play songs. Audio controls added to control the audio.

title: Bookmark App
description: Bookmark app to save bookmarks. A form is used to add bookmarks & local storage to set & get the bookmarks.

title: Joke Teller
description: The Joke Teller app will display & tell technology jokes. Clicking on Tell me a joke button will tell us a new joke

title: Calculator
description: The Calculator app will do the basic math calculations. It is developed using HTML, CS and JavaScript.

title: Infinite Scroll
description: The Infinite Scroll app will infinitely load the images. It will lazy load the new images towards the end

title: Form Validator
description: Form Validator app will validate the form fields using JS. Success message will be shown if the form is validated.

title: Instagram Logo
description: This is a small CSS drawing. Instagram logo is drawn completely using HTML and SCSS.
